name: Readings by Marvelous Madame Tarot
profile:
Hello all and Welcome to Readings with Marvelous Madame Tarot! 

I am “Marve" an Intuitive Tarot Reader, Cartomancer (playing card divination), Spiritual Coach, Certified Life Coach, Novice Astrologer and I am charmed to make your acquaintance!

I AM A Mother, poet, writer, and blogger. passionate about exploring the triumphs of all women and overcoming our unique struggles. 

Join me, the world is our stage! 

Marve-
Readings by Marvelous Madame Tarot!
